content:
The defense forces of southern Ukraine reported how long the Russian hypersonic winged rocket "Zircon" can fly to Ukrainian cities.

This is stated inmessageGroup.

It is noted that the average speed of the specified rocket is 9000 km/h.

"Often more," the defense forces emphasize.

According to experts, "Zircon" comes:

Odesa, Kherson, Nikolaev - up to 1 minute;

Zaporozhye, Dnipro - up to 2.5 minutes;

Kropyvnytskyi - up to 3 minutes.

As reported by the Armyinform, Ukrainian expertsInstalledthat Russia used to strike in Kiev on February 7, 2024, Zircon rocket.
title: The defense forces reported the time of the Russian Zircona's torture to Ukrainian cities
